snippet: As he seeks his first major singles title at Wimbledon, Andy Murray has Ivan Lendl in his corner, a man who has won eight Grand Slam singles trophies.
abstract: Andy Murray, seeking his first major singles title at Wimbledon, has Ivan Lendl in his corner, a man who won eight Grand Slam singles trophies; Murray faces the formidable Roger Federer in the men's final.
lead_paragraph: As he seeks his first major singles title at Wimbledon, Andy Murray has Ivan Lendl in his corner, a man who has won eight Grand Slam singles trophies.

headline.seo: Andy Murray Is Succeeding With Ivan Lendl in His Corner
headline.main: Lendl Has Set the Path for Murray
headline.print_headline: Lendl Has Set the Path for Murray
